message.noSlides: Seems you haven't any Slides yet. Head over to the Elysium Slides Module and create some.

list.label: Slide selection
list.helptext: Click in the search field and select your slide collection. You will find your slides under Contents › Elysium Slides, where you can also create new slides.

headline.label: Headline
headline.helpText: Set a heading for the slide. You can use the HTML tags br, i, u, b, strong and span.
